name: Horse Simulator 2017 | My Little Racing Horses
name_original: Horse Simulator 2017 | My Little Racing Horses
description:
New dangers threaten your herd of wild horses. Cougars are hungry and want you to become their dinner. Plus, now hundreds of cowboys believe your meadow is a great hunting paradise.

Can you make your horse fast enough to get rid of your enemies?

Realistic horses
Run through this paradise with incredible graphics, while enjoying the spectacular scenery of the wildest America.

Frenetic races
Dodge, jump and run to save your friends!

To survive in this race you not only need an unbreakable spirit, but you have to be the most skillful and fastest horse.

Be careful, because not only cougars and cowboys will attack you, your own herd of horses are nervous and will get in your way.

Are you going to be the winning horse, a cimarron stallion? Or will you become a weak docile horse?

Follow us on Twitter: @WildSimulator
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/WildSimulatorGames
